reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: ACC - AgroCadenas Colombia: Alleanze pubbliche-private per il consolidamento della pace

description.narrative: Il progetto mira a migliorare il tenore di vita degli agricoltori nelle comunità rurali, rafforzando l'intera catena del valore di frutti tropicali, cacao e caffè
The project aims at improving the living standard of farmers in rural communities, strengthening the whole Value Chains of tropical fruits, Cocoa and Coffee.

organisation.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

tag.narrative: By 2030, ensure sustainable food production systems and implement resilient agricultural practices that increase productivity and production, that help maintain ecosystems, that strengthen capacity for adaptation to climate change, extreme weather, drought, flooding and other disasters and that progressively improve land and soil quality
End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture
